description: A document that contains expenses for n amount wallets across different dimensions, such as expense types and categories. The flow inside a new expense report starts with the user adding wallets that would represent the expenses. Each wallet would be able to extract the expenses from the list of billing statements that are added to the wallet. From the billing statements, the line items inside the wallet are built with the rich data. For example, a line item has a tag that could be directly linked to a LineItemGroup by the group field. Once all line items are added to the Wallet.lineItems list, the next Wallet.totals field could start being populated. This Wallet.total field holds a list of GroupTotals. These group totals aggregate the line item values by the group they belong to. Once the Wallet.totals is finished, the user will be able to see a full expense report. The last steps for the user are to set the periodStart and periodEnd fields to complete the report.
name: Expense Report

operations.description: Adds a new wallet to the expense report
operations.name: ADD_WALLET

operations.description: Removes a wallet from the expense report
operations.name: REMOVE_WALLET
operations.template: Removes a wallet from the expense report

operations.description: Adds a billing statement reference to a specific wallet
operations.name: ADD_BILLING_STATEMENT
operations.template: Adds a billing statement reference to a specific wallet

operations.description: Removes a billing statement reference from a specific wallet
operations.name: REMOVE_BILLING_STATEMENT
operations.template: Removes a billing statement reference from a specific wallet

operations.description: Adds a new line item to a specific wallet
operations.name: ADD_LINE_ITEM
operations.schema:
input AddLineItemInput {
  wallet: EthereumAddress!
  lineItem: LineItemInput!
}

input LineItemInput {
  id: ID!
  label: String
  group: ID
  budget: Float
  actuals: Float
  forecast: Float
  payments: Float
  comments: String
}
operations.template: Adds a new line item to a specific wallet

operations.description: Updates an existing line item in a specific wallet
operations.name: UPDATE_LINE_ITEM
operations.schema:
input UpdateLineItemInput {
  wallet: EthereumAddress!
  lineItemId: ID!
  label: String
  group: ID
  budget: Float
  actuals: Float
  forecast: Float
  payments: Float
  comments: String
}
operations.template: Updates an existing line item in a specific wallet

operations.description: Removes a line item from a specific wallet
operations.name: REMOVE_LINE_ITEM
operations.template: Removes a line item from a specific wallet

operations.description: Adds a new line item group for categorizing expenses
operations.name: ADD_LINE_ITEM_GROUP
operations.template: Adds a new line item group for categorizing expenses

operations.description: Updates an existing line item group
operations.name: UPDATE_LINE_ITEM_GROUP
operations.template: Updates an existing line item group

operations.description: Sets or updates the totals for a specific group within a wallet
operations.name: SET_GROUP_TOTALS
operations.template: Sets or updates the totals for a specific group within a wallet

operations.description: Removes group totals for a specific group within a wallet
operations.name: REMOVE_GROUP_TOTALS
operations.template: Removes group totals for a specific group within a wallet

operations.description: Sets the start date for the expense report period
operations.name: SET_PERIOD_START
operations.template: Sets the start date for the expense report period

operations.description: Sets the end date for the expense report period
operations.name: SET_PERIOD_END

global.schema:
type ExpenseReportState {
  wallets: [Wallet!]!
  groups: [LineItemGroup!]!
  periodStart: DateTime
  periodEnd: DateTime
}

type Wallet {
  name: String
  wallet: EthereumAddress
  totals: [GroupTotals]
  billingStatements: [OID]
  lineItems: [LineItem]
  accountDocumentId: PHID
  accountTransactionsDocumentId: PHID
}

type LineItemGroup {
  id: ID!
  label: String
  parentId: ID
}

type GroupTotals {
  group: ID  ## LineItemGroupId
  totalBudget: Float
  totalForecast: Float
  totalActuals: Float
  totalPayments: Float
}

type LineItem {
  id: ID
  label: String
  group: ID  ## LineItemGroupId
  budget: Float
  actuals: Float
  forecast: Float
  payments: Float
  comments: String
}
